attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: This app is terrible first of all when I first opened the app I see a big Cheeto on my screen I don’t know if it was supposed to be a joke or just there . 2nd I hate this app because it started to lag and then when it’s done lagging it takes me to this picture of a Cheeto with a small d**k and that was disgusting like really nasty 3rd I just don’t like the app its awful.💩💩

attributes.title: This app killed me
attributes.review: As you can see from the title I am dead. When I opened the app yesterday my phone immediately started to heat up. I was so confused because why would our lovely Trump have an app like this. I didn’t believe it so I just closed the app and then soon as I closed the app my phone blew up. My phone blew up in my face and made my whole head fall off and then I died. I am being buried tomorrow if you would like to come to my funeral just follow me on Instagram and TikTok just type in Mirella Thompson and you’ll find me and you may come to my funeral. Don’t worry I will Rest In Peace.

attributes.title: don’t get it 🤮🤮
attributes.review: this app took 7389399 years to download! when it finally did, i opened up the app just to see that i’m going to prison! all because i kidnapped the president’s son. i never got caught neither.

attributes.title: 🙈💅🧚‍♀️✨
attributes.review: We don’t like an orange ass, pedo, racist, homophobic, fat, rapist person as our president 🧚‍♀️✨💅🙈

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♀️💕✨
attributes.review:
if i could give the app ZERO stars i would !!!!
I downloaded this app a few day ago in order to support our very amazing president Trump ❤️✨🧚🏻‍♀️. BUT, this is the worst app i ever downloaded. Let me tell you why. Everything was going on fine until i opened the app ❌❌❌. Once i opened the app i got so scared when this cheeto man popped up out of no where 😔. I been having nightmares every single day since then !!! THIS IS NOT FAKEE. I also noticed that my kitchen utensils 🍴were making their way into my room🤔. I thought to myself my house is probably haunted, but once i did some research i found out the TRUTH!!! The truth is that once you download the app it sets a curse upon you to start hallucinating anything the app wants you to. I went further into the app because i would never betray our super innocent daddy Trump 🧚🏻‍♀️✨💕. But the app kept me hallucinating many horrendous things i am TRAUMATIZED 😱😱😱. I kept using the app for a couple of days but i saw a HUGE  glitch in the screen and it was none other than Barron Trump and Melania Trump screaming for help😯😯😯😯. I did further investigation and found out they are being held captive 😡.Trump is not a good president for numerous of reasons for his racist behavior and etc.This app is the WORSTTT.

 Trump 20never❤️

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!
attributes.review: I was s disappointed with this app. I was so excited that there is a way to follow Trump and his campaign, because even though I am a women I for some reason want to vote for a man who has repeatedly been misogynistic and objectifies women, but the second I downloaded this app everything went down hill. First thousands of pop-ups showed up in my screen just one after the other asking horrible questions like “do I want to die” and then it started threatening me and I was like okay tbis is enough! But then it installed some type of virus on my phone and I can’t delete the app! And now every 5 minutes a video of Mr.orange-man shows up and it just starts screaming. I’m scared to turn on my phone for fear of Donald trump screaming in my face

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I decided to try try this app out becase I saw it in a YouTube video but it took 2 years to download and once it finally downloaded it took up so much storage I couldn’t do anything else and lastly there there was this orange rasist man on the app who ask for my phone number!? Overall this app was so horrible that I would not even recommend it to my worst enemy

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review:
This took a whole day to download and when I opened it up I saw a nasty Cheeto that fell on the floor🤢.
     When I tried to exit it the god forsaken app it deleted all my data so I got mad 😡 and threw my phone and it boomeranged back at me so now I have 23 stitches and a Broken neck.so now I have no choice but to leave a bad review😠
     So now I want to know who is going to pay a billions of dollars in medical bills??
